rdf:Description.dc:title: X-treme safety : survival tips for rookies in the workplace 2001 survival tips for rookies in the workplace.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Human Resources and Employment.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton, Alta. : Alberta Human Resources and Employment,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Available also on-line through the Alberta Learning Information Service (ALIS) at : www.alis.gov.ab.ca/careershop

This booklet is about workplace safety for a young (15-24 years of age) workers. Topics include a list of common risk factors, physical, biological and chemical hazards, unsafe work, employer's responsibilities.

This booklet is about workplace safety for a young (15-24 years of age) worker. Topics include a list of common risk factors, physical, biological and chemical hazards, unsafe work, employer's responsibilities.
Approved for use in Alberta schools.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Industrial safety.
